fields.title: Search Engine Developer M/F
fields.details: About the job                                  The search platform team provides some of the most important touch points for our e-commerce customers. We strive to continuously improve the quality of our services and the richness of functionalities to provide the most amazing user experience. To do so, we continuously consume and learn from large-scale data sets as well as deliver some of the largest distributed systems deployments in the company.Position:We are looking for talented, passionate and action oriented individuals to challenge what existing Search technologies can do & going beyond. With understanding of latest technologies and trends, you will utilize your experience to solve complex difficult problems to evolve and grow Search Platform.The search platform team has a diverse portfolio of development activities. Based on your interest, you might also get the opportunity to work on:large scale distributed systemlarge scale data processingcore search engine development and information retrieval solutionsdata sciencemachine learningcomputational linguistics Position DetailsThe search platform team is looking for Search Engine Developer to join us. Responsibilities (includes but not limited to):- As a core member of the team, you will be responsible for design, documentation, implementation and testing of features on the search engine core or its surrounding platform.- Continuously improve the search experience and relevance by experimenting with new features and algorithms, and measuring their impact.- Evaluate the performance impact of those new features and algorithms.- Analyze and understand service specific requirements and needs to create generic solutions to be integrated in the search platform- Contribute to the technical and product direction of the search platform.Mandatory Qualifications:-BS in Computer Science or a related field (M.S. or Ph.D. preferred)-3+ years of relevant professional experience-Java programming proficiency, working on production software with a focus on -maintainability and performance-Very good understanding of algorithms and data structures-Good understanding of running a large-scale distributed production system-English : FluentDesired Qualifications:-Experience or good understanding of Apache Lucene, Apache Solr, -ElasticSearch, or other similar technologies-Experience or good understanding of Apache Hadoop, Apache Cassandra, Apache ZooKeeper or other similartechnologies-Familiarity with Linux, including monitoring and troubleshooting running applications-Understanding of E-Commerce.

fields.title: Desarrollador/a iOS (100% remoto)
fields.details: About the job                                  ¿Te gustaría continuar desarrollándote como Desarrollador/a iOS manejando Swift dentro de un entorno agile?Desde Oxigent Technologies, seleccionamos un/a DESARROLLADOR/A IOS para incorporarse en una multinacional líder en el sector retail en modalidad 100% remoto.¿Cuáles serán tus funciones?Trabajar en un equipo ágil y multidisciplinar con involucración en todo el ciclo de desarrollo.Diseñar nuevas funcionalidades e implementar soluciones técnicas de calidad.Promover estándares de buenas prácticas.Para ello, ¿qué necesitamos?Al menos 2 años en desarrollo con Swift.Conocimiento de Objective-C.Familiarizado con productos móviles y ciclos de vida de diseño.Experiencia con marcos de trabajo de iOS y compresión del ciclo de lanzamiento.Y llegados a este punto... ¿qué te ofrecemos?🤝Contrato indefinido.📚Cheque Formación: que tendrás disponible para seguir aprendiendo nuevas tecnologías para desarrollarte en las áreas que más te interesen (como: Agile, DevOps, Cloud, QA, Back-end, Front-end, etc) o incluso para mejorar tus skills en idiomas.💰Salario acorde a la experiencia aportada (aprox entre 28.000 - 36.000 euros brutos anuales).💉Seguro médico privado.🤸‍♀️Aplicación de acceso a gimnasios con descuentos: apostamos por un estilo de vida saludable, por eso ofrecemos descuentos especiales en instalaciones de múltiples centros deportivos.🤑Retribución flexible aplicable a seguro médico, restaurante, transporte, guardería y formación.🏠Modelo de trabajo 100 % remoto.💫Horario flexible.

fields.title: Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET Frontend) (f/m/d)
fields.details: About the job                                  wefox is the world’s leading Insurtech that is reinventing insurance at scale, with a record-breaking Series C funding in 2021 and our Series D funding in 2022 wefox has raised over $1 billion US Dollar. wefox is on track to revolutionise the insurance industry by empowering the customer and delivering personalised experiences driven by data.Our vision is to make insurance simple and 10x better. We provide our customers with 360-degree advice through our network of advisors and optimise each individual's risk coverage through innovative prevention, assistance and insurance products.We are looking for a Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) to join our team. Your daily work will primarily focus on the development of automated testing procedures for our microservices, APIs, and customer-facing web and mobile applications. Our teams write quality code using TDD and Unit Testing. We use GitHub, GitHub Actions, and a full CI/CD pipeline. You will work side by side with a multidisciplinary and multicultural team distributed among our different offices around Europe.As a Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) your daily work will primarily focus on the development of automated testing procedures for our frontend and backend applications. We work using best practices (Testing, Code Review…) in an environment of agile methodologies. You will work side by side with a multidisciplinary and multicultural team distributed among our different offices around Europe.In this role you will:Understand product and technical priorities. Independently scope and implement Test automation code. Contribute to project estimation tasks and commit to a realistic amount of work. Make well-reasoned design decisions, identifying potential issues, trade-offs, risks, and an appropriate level of abstraction. Write meaningful code reviews. Mentor junior and mentee engineers within your squad. Contribute to a security-first mindset throughout your squad, always looking for and avoiding vulnerabilities. What you bring:Hands-on experience with JavaScript. We believe it takes about 2 years of hands-on experience in order to be comfortable at this level, but if you have less experience than that we welcome you to apply. Hands-on experience creating Test automation code for client/server applications. Hands-on experience with SQL or NoSQL databases. Hands-on experience with RESTful APIs. A positive, can-do attitude and a willingness to learn and grow with us. Experience working with git is a plus. Working knowledge of English is required; proficiency in Spanish or German is a plus. In our team, being tech-savvy and having great dedication to high-quality delivery are as equally valued as your authenticity, accountability, and team-player skills.What we offer:Now, we’ve gotten to the fun part, the part where you get to brag about your company, those perks your friends are so jealous of.Here are some of them*:Flexible working hours including hybrid working Free access to a mental health and well-being platform for personalised care, such as 1:1 coaching and therapy sessions for life’s ups and downs — whether at work, at home, or in your relationships A stack of the latest technologies and working gadgets Training and Coaching opportunities Free coffee, fruit, and snacks because we need fuel! If you love a less-formal work environment, flexible paid time off, a great compensation package and benefits offering - and most of all, being the authentic you, get in touch, we want to meet you!To all the misunderstood geniuses, rebels and mavericks looking to change the world for the better. Come work with us! Additional Benefits vary between countries and can be explained in more detail by a TA Partner. We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status or disability status.By submitting the application I confirm to have read and accepted the data privacy policy governing the job application process.

fields.title: .NET Software Engineer II - Digital Markets
fields.details: About the job                                  About Gartner Digital MarketsGartner Digital Markets is a business unit within Gartner. Our mission is to help small businesses make the right technology choices and find the tools they need to grow, optimize, and become more effective at what they do. The business is comprised of three top brands—Capterra, Software Advice, and GetApp. For candidates interested in taking their next career step in the technology space, Gartner Digital Markets offers the fast pace and excitement of working for a startup, the stability and resources of a large, established organization, and the opportunity to be on the front lines of innovation in an industry that is always growing and transforming.What We’re Looking ForGartner Digital Markets is looking for a passionate .NET Software Engineer II to work with our highly skilled technology team located in central Barcelona.This position works closely with our designers and engineers to build a compelling product and implement exciting new features - all with the goal of ensuring a great experience for website users.Why You’ll Want To Come To WorkResponsible for the timely development of well-defined, larger product features/changes, expected to use judgement & apply functional knowledge of methodology/best practices; Develop code documentation as a reference.Develop software solutions by studying information needs; conferring with users; studying systems flow, data usage and work processes; investigating problem areas; following the software development lifecycle.Become active participant in technical design process, expected to contribute own ideas for changes/new features; Capable of owning independent small-to-medium features all the way through from technical design to launch.Collaborating with remote teams on joint software projects, demonstrating a high level of English language and technical communication skills. Maintaining and improving existing infrastructure (AWS) and software solutions (C# .NET, Node.js, Angular/JavaScript).Contributing to software architecture decisions, applying best practices and experience in the field.What You’ll Bring To The Team2 - 5 years+ of relevant experience. Advanced software development using C# and JavaScript.Strong knowledge of Relational Databases and SQL.Advanced knowledge of software development methodology, techniques & standards.Strong understanding of software design concepts, patterns, tools, best practices.Strong knowledge of web application development.Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering is a plus.Verbal English skills (we work in English!).Check out our video to learn about who we are, and what we do:vid.gartner.com/digitalmarketsWhat You’ll FindLimitless growth and learning opportunities.A collaborative and positive culture — join a diverse team of professionals that are as smart and driven as you.A chance to make an impact — Your work will contribute directly to our strategy.Frequent social activities such as movie night, laser tag, bowling, escape room, summer beach party, hiking & bbq, and more!Modern approach to work - Flexible hours, Friday afternoons free, remote work, and more.New offices (to be inaugurated soon) close to Glòries and the beach in the fantastic, “innovation and tech” 22@ district of sunny Barcelona.Fresh fruit, snacks, selection of teas, fair trade organic coffee and a fridge full of beer for our Beer O’Clock on Friday afternoons.Relocation Assistance - A specialist to help you with all the appointments and paperwork.What You’ll ReceiveCompetitive compensation.23 days annual holiday, and additional days off for your birthday, 24th & 31st of December.Private Medical and Dental Care.Life and Disability Insurance.Public Transport Subsidy.Ticket Restaurant Card.Childcare Vouchers (Ticket Guarderia).IncentiFit - annual reimbursement for health-and-wellness-related activities.Pension Scheme.Tuition Reimbursement.Employee Stock Purchase Plan.Employee Assistance Program.Gartner Gives Charity Match.What Are WeAction Oriented - Deliver fast, get great results. We embrace the vision, roadmap to success and the action it takes to make it happen. Intellectually Curious - Seek to learn, love to teach. We’re humble and embrace respectful, radical candor with a mindset of ongoing professional and personal development.Collaborative - One team, shared mission. We welcome feedback and understand the value of working together to accomplish more than what is possible individually.Please Note Applications must be submitted in English. A valid EU visa/passport is required for this position.Explore Diversity, Inclusion And Engagement At Gartnerjobs.gartner.com/inclusion#digitalmarketsWho are we?Gartner delivers actionable, objective insight to executives and their teams. Our expert guidance and tools enable faster, smarter decisions and stronger performance on an organization’s most critical priorities. We’ve grown exponentially since our founding in 1979 and we're proud to have nearly 16,000 associates globally that support our 14,000+ clients in more than 100 countries.What makes Gartner a great place to work?Our teams are composed of individuals from different geographies, cultures, religions, ethnicities, races, genders, sexual orientations, abilities and generations. We believe that a variety of experiences makes us stronger—as individuals, as communities and as an organization. That’s why we're recognized worldwide as a great place to work year after year. We've been recognized by Fortune as one of the World’s Most Admired Companies, named a Best Place to Work for LGBTQ Equality by the Human Rights Campaign Corporate Equality Index and a Best Place to Work for Disability Inclusion by the Disability Equality Index. Looking for a place to turn your big ideas into reality? Join #LifeAtGartnerWhat We OfferOur people are our most valuable asset, so we invest in them from Day 1. When you join our team, you’ll have access to a vast array of benefits to help you live your life well. These resources are designed to support your physical, financial and emotional well-being. We encourage continued personal and professional growth through ongoing learning and development opportunities. Our employee resource groups, charity match and volunteer programs keep you connected to your internal Gartner community and causes that matter to you.The policy of Gartner is to provide equal employment opportunities to all applicants and employees without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, citizenship status, age, national origin, ancestry, disability, veteran status, or any other legally protected status and to affirmatively seek to advance the principles of equal employment opportunity.Gartner is committed to being an Equal Opportunity Employer and offers opportunities to all job seekers, including job seekers with disabilities. If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access the Company’s career webpage as a result of your disability. You may request reasonable accommodations by calling Human Resources at +1 (203) 964-0096 or by sending an email to ApplicantAccommodations@gartner.com.Job Requisition ID:65619By submitting your information and application, you confirm that you have read and agree to the country or regional recruitment notice linked below applicable to your place of residence.Gartner Applicant Privacy Link: https://jobs.gartner.com/applicant-privacy-policyFor efficient navigation through the application, please only use the back button within the application, not the back arrow within your browser.

fields.title: Desarrollador/a React
fields.details: About the job                                  ¿Quiénes somos?Somos una Consultora Tecnológica que ayuda a las organizaciones en su proceso de Metamorfosis Digital. Nuestra diferenciación se basa en nuestro Offering de servicios y tecnologías de vanguardia, y en nuestra Cultura moderna, ágil, innovadora y flexible.En Izertis somos más de 1700 profesionales, pero queremos seguir sumando talento para hacer más grande nuestra familia. Trabajar con el equipo de Izertis es trabajar con un equipo humano, con su propia cultura, brindando a cada profesional la oportunidad de ser el dueño de su propia historia dentro de Izertis. Cada persona cuenta y es por eso que somos una gran familia profesional, donde compartimos conocimientos y vivencias y donde nos ayudamos a crecer profesionalmenteExisten muchas razones para trabajar en Izertis https://www.izertis.com/en/talentEstamos buscando nuev@s compañer@s con experiencia en React para formar parte de alguno de los diferentes proyectos en los que trabajamos actualmente.¿Qué te hará triunfar?- Que hayas montado proyectos desde cero, con capacidad de revisar y organizar la arquitectura de una aplicación en react (no necesitamos que sea arquitecto).- Que hayas trabajado con herramientas de testing a nivel de front (Jest, Cypress, Jasmine, etc.)Valoramos que hayas tenido experiencia con React Native.¿Qué encontrarás en Izertis?-Trabaja con contrato indefinido desde el primer día, en una compañía tecnológica puntera, con presencia en más de 50 países del mundo.-Fórmate desde el primer día, te permitiría desarrollar tu carrera profesional de una manera más clara y podrás especializarte aún más en eso que te apasiona.-Benefíciate de un plan de retribución flexible a gestionar de manera individual entre los siguientes servicios: seguro médico, guardería, ayuda a comida, transporte público.-Disfruta de jornada intensiva los meses de Julio y Agosto, además de todos los viernes del año.Te escuchamos, ¿Hablamos?

fields.title: Full Stack Software Engineer M/F
fields.details: About the job                                  We're looking for an experienced Full Stack Engineer who is excited about the opportunity to build applications to manage our large Search deployment.Our system leverages a variety of technologies from Big Data (Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, Kubernetes, ...), back-end (Java, Spring Boot, ...), and front-end (React.js) to build intuitive, scalable, and interactive applications.As a Full Stack Engineer in the Search Platform Team, you'll work with a team that is fully responsible for every aspect of the development cycle, including architectural design, implementation, and integration of back-end and front-end services and evaluation and tuning of the system's stability and scalability.In our team we always strive to self-improve and challenge our system, putting special emphasis on finding the right approach to each improvement in order to make our platform maintainable and flexible.Mandatory Qualifications:3+ years Java programming proficiencyExperience with Front-end and Back-end with modern frameworksExperience with Web API developmentGood understanding of system bottlenecks and troubleshootingExperience with large-scale distributed systemsDesired Qualifications:Experience with React.js and Spring BootExperience with performance-sensitive (low latency, highly scalable) systemsExperience with high availability, fault-tolerant and self-healing systems.Experience with Linux Systems usage and troubleshooting

fields.title: Software Engineer (Web)
fields.details: About the job                                  Build a career powered by innovations that matter! At Novanta, our innovations power technology products that are transforming healthcare and advanced manufacturing—improving productivity, enhancing people’s lives and redefining what’s possible. We create for our global customers engineered components and sub-systems that deliver extreme precision and performance for a range of mission-critical applications—from minimally invasive surgery to robotics to 3D metal printing.Novanta is one global team with over 26 offices located in The Americas, Europe and Asia-Pacific. Looking for a great place to work? You have found it with a culture that embraces teamwork, collaboration and empowerment. Come explore Novanta.Job SummaryWe are looking for a young, talented, and highly motivated engineer who will be responsible for bringing new products to market reality whilst ensuring high levels of quality to current products. Come join a team of deeply knowledgeable engineers that strive to build the most robust andreliable motion control systems using cutting-edge development tools and practices.The select engineer will be focused on developing and maintaining a set of internal and external Web applications (full-stack). The internal applications are key tools used by our engineering andoperations team to control and have traceability of all the products manufactured.The external applications are tools to help our customers properly dimension the required components for an application.Primary ResponsibilitiesDevelop and maintain a set of Web Applications.Write internal documentation for Ingenia software platforms (Architecture, Detailed Design, etc.).Define, in conjunction with the Quality Assurance team, the Test Plans forIngenia software products.Required Experience And EducationMS or PhD in Computer ScienceMinimum experience 1+ yearMinimum RequirementsSkills and CompetenciesProved experience in the development of Web applications.Experience with SQL.Knowledge of PHP.Experience in software testing procedures.Knowledge of Agile development methodologies.The Position Requires The Following Soft Skills And AbilitiesExcellent written, verbal, and interpersonal communication skills.Ability to work in a team-oriented, collaborative environment.New technologies enthusiast.Capacity to analyze a problem from multiple perspectives and explore creative solutions.Positive, proactive, and energic attitude.Fluent in written and spoken English.High attention to detail with a desire for excellenceTravel RequirementsOccasionally travel as needed (domestically and internationally) to customers for support and/or installation.Novanta is proud to be an equal employment opportunity and affirmative action workplace. We consider all qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, military and veteran status, disability, genetics, or any other category protected by federal law or Novanta policy.Please call +1 781-266-5700 if you need a disability accommodation for any part of the employment process.

fields.title: Développeur Fullstack (H/F)
fields.details: About the job                                  Vous souhaitez rejoindre une entreprise qui place l’humain au cœur de ses préoccupations ? On vous attend chez Extia !Société de conseil spécialisée dans les métiers de l’IT, de l’ingénierie et du digital, Extia privilégie depuis sa création en 2007 une approche qui allie performance et bien-être au travail. Une vision de l’entreprise partagée aujourd’hui par plus de 2 200 Extien(ne)s en France et à l'international et récompensée depuis 2012 par le label Great Place to Work®.Chez Extia, c’est « D’abord qui, ensuite quoi » alors, allons-y !D'abord qui Impliqué(e), votre équipe peut toujours compter sur vous Proactif(ve), vous aimez les projets qui avancent vite et bien Organisé(e), vous êtes l’as des to-do listEnsuite quoiDescription Du PosteAu sein d'une équipe Agile (Scrum / Kanban), vous participerez aux missions suivantesAnalyse des besoins exprimés par le Product OwnerMise en œuvre des bonnes pratiques d'ingénierie afin d'assurer la qualité des livrables (TDD/ BDD / clean code / Revues de code...)Conceptions logicielles et techniquesDéploiement d'applications en collaboration avec les OPS de la tribuMaintenance applicativeAmélioration de l’exploitabilité des applications développées par la feature team Rédaction de la documentation technique Participation aux cérémonies agiles de l’équipe (DSM, Sprint planning, rétrospectives, …), et contribution à son amélioration continueConnaissances techniques : Java 8 à 11, React ou Angular, Jira AgilePROFIL RECHERCHEDe niveau BAC +3 ou BAC+5 d’une école d’ingénieur ou formation en informatique, vous êtes à la recherche de votre nouvelle aventure à l'international.Software craftsman (méthodologie Agile, TDD, DDD, BDD/ATDD, MVVM, VIP, Clean Code)

fields.title: Internship SW Embedded
fields.location: El Prat de Llobregat, Catalonia, Spain
fields.details: About the job                                  En G+D Mobile Security, líderes en SmartCards y Secure Payment elements (Tarjetas de crédito, SIM/eSIM, Vehículos, Smartphones, Wearables), buscamos estudiantes con ganas de realizar prácticas en nuestros departamentos de desarrollo de software en R+D. Queremos personas con muchas ganas de aprender, con ganas de experimentar el entorno laboral y motivadas en el desarrollo de software. Desarrollo de SW embebido (Software de sistema).Desarrollo de software a bajo nivel, un SO modular integrado en el chip de todas nuestras soluciones.Estudiantes que quieran enfocarse a la pelea de bits y bytes.Trabajarás con lenguajes como: C/ C++/Python/Perl.Tus prácticas:Tendrás un mentor/a asignado y te integrarás en la dinámica de un proyecto real y un equipo scrum des del primer día.Formación inicial asociada a las tareas del proyecto en el que participas.Buen ambiente de trabajo. Multicultural, joven, dinámico y entusiasta. (actualmente teletrabajo)¿Aprender? Por supuesto! Obtendrás un expertise completo que te abrirá todas las puertas.¿Más tareas? Dependerá de ti, de tus ganas de aprender y de seguir creciendoPosibilidades reales de pasar a empresa al finalizar las prácticas.Qué perfil buscamos:Estudiantes de Informática, Telecos, Física o Matemáticas.Apasionados/as por el desarrollo y con ganas de aprender más.Creativos/as. Capaces de encontrar la solución y ser capaces de programarla.Motivados/as para aprender mucho y trabajar duro.Horario: 20h-25h/semana (flexible, nos adaptamos a tus estudios).Tiempo: 9 meses y posibilidad de continuar

fields.title: Vue Developer
fields.details: About the job                                  ¿Quiénes somos?Somos una empresa experta en ayudar a crecer a otras a través de nuestro dominio tecnológico, resolución de retos tecnológicos complejos y foco en la excelencia operacional. Desde 2012, hemos crecido anualmente a un ritmo medio del 30% y durante tres años consecutivos - 2019, 2020 y 2021 - hemos sido una de las empresas de mayor crecimiento en Europa según el Financial Times.Somos nativos digitales y neutrales tecnológicos gracias a nuestras capacidades de rápida adaptación y resolución a cualquier situación y reto de negocio.Nos apasionan los retos tecnológicos de gran impacto en negocio. Para ello, contamos con equipos de alto rendimiento y la capacidad de combinar tecnologías de forma rápida y solvente.Acompañamos en la evolución digital de nuestros clientes para conseguir la máxima eficiencia en sus negocios, aportando nuestra extensa experiencia multisectorial.Te invitamos a conocernos en profundidad navegando por los distintos apartados de nuestra página web: https://www.innocv.com/¿Qué harás?En INNOCV Solutions estamos creciendo y trabajando en nuevos proyectos. Te unirás a uno de nuestros equipos, el cual destaca por las siguientes capacidades:Desarrollo de aplicaciones web en Angular, React y Vue.  Desarrollo de aplicaciones móviles híbridas con React Native.Creación de arquitecturas cloud & híbridas con Kubernetes.Implementación de flujos de despliegue continuo CI/CD. Integración Salesforce en procesos de captación/gestión de servicio.¿Qué valoramos?Experiencia con Vue. Desarrollo de código limpio. Conocimientos de testing. Capacidad de trabajo con metodologías ágiles.  Sólidos conocimientos en JavaScript y TypeScript. Alto nivel de inglés.Además, aunque no es imprescindible, también nos gustaría:Conocimientos de Angular.  Conocimientos de React.  Testing automatizado (KARMA/JASMINE).Experiencia en desarrollo en otros lenguajes. Si eres una persona que le gusta estar actualizada en las últimas tendencias, inquieta por probar nuevas tecnologías, y te gusta encontrar otras formas de hacer las cosa, éste es tu sitio. Si te consideras un/a team player que defiende el Fair Play ante todo… ¡hay un equipo esperándote!¿Qué te ofrecemos?En esta empresa podrás ser tú mismo/a, y trabajarás con compañeros/as igual de apasionados por la tecnología y la innovación, dispuestos a ayudarte en todo momento. Queremos verte evolucionar y crecer con nosotros. Para ello invertimos en tu desarrollo profesional, con formación, desayunos tecnológicos y asistencia a foros. Somos defensores del aprendizaje continuo y, por ello, proporcionamos una bolsa de dinero personal, porque nos flipa estar a la última siguiendo las tendencias del mercado.Nos importa tu bienestar y felicidad en el trabajo, y, por ello, escuchamos tus necesidades para poder ofrecerte las condiciones más óptimas de trabajo en un ambiente humano único.Esto es un WIN -WIN y, por todo lo que aportarás, te ofrecemos:Remuneración adaptada a tus conocimientos, experiencia y potencial.Hasta 100% teletrabajo. Tú decides desde dónde trabajar, pudiendo acudir a la oficina siempre que lo desees.Flexibilidad horaria (con horarios de entrada entre las 7h-10h).Jornada intensiva todos los viernes del año, ¡además de todo julio y agosto!6 días de vacaciones extra cada trienio, con posibilidad de canjearlos por reducción de jornada o excedencia, ¡tú eliges!Día de tu cumpleaños libre.Seguro médico privado gratuito.Modelo de desarrollo individual basado en cinturones, con acceso a bolsa de dinero individual para formación y asistencia a foros, tras realizar la EADI. Clases de inglés con plataforma blended para obtener la certificación.Referral bonus. ¡Te recompensamos si incorporamos a una recomendación tuya!Participación voluntaria en acciones solidarias, presenciales y virtuales, para dejar nuestra huella positiva en el mundo.Reuniones de empresa trimestrales, viaje "fin de curso" de empresa y, sobre todo… ¡compañerismo, diversión, celebraciones, Hackathon interna y eventos de Team Building donde estamos juntos!Si quieres saber más sobre nosotros, los protagonistas te cuentan más de la empresa.Si te sientes identificado con nuestra filosofía de trabajo y tienes la misma pasión que nosotros por la INNOvación, y la Code Vocation, ¡queremos conocerte!

fields.title: Programadores/as Java - Senior/Junior
fields.details: About the job                                  En Smarting buscamos un programadores Java, con capacidad de aprender nuevas tecnologías y poder aplicarlas.Requerimos:Experiencia mínima de 1 año, demostrable, en desarrollo en aplicaciones cliente-servidor usando Java como lenguaje principal.Se valorará:Experiencia en gradle/maven/antConocimiento y experiencia en Java, Kotlin, Android, iOS, Linux, SQL, microservicios, docker, Kubernetes, Kafka y CassandraExperiencia no profesional, como por ejemplo, proyectos personalesTareas a realizar:Desarrollo de aplicaciones cliente-servidor en JavaAplicaciones de AndroidAplicaciones iOS

fields.title: Senior Frontend Software Engineer | Spain & Italy
fields.details: About the job                                  As a Senior Frontend Software Engineer, you’ll work on cutting-edge technologies to design, scale, and maintain Frontend applications using Vuejs. TUI Musement Frontend architecture is mainly based on our home-made Shared Components Architecture, which is intended to provide an highly reusable set of components. TUI Musement’s backend architecture embraces the “backend for frontend” pattern. This approach allows us to easily connect our backend to a bunch of different client applications: SPA, mobile app, or other backend systems.About The Job You will be a key part of a team that owns all phases of the product development life cycle, from conception to delivery to customers. You will be required to collaborate with solution architects and product managers to deliver high-quality technical solutions. You’ll work on cutting edge technologies as well as mature technologies to design, scale, and maintain our backend architecture. You’ll develop high-quality backend code with a strong focus on automated testing. You’ll participate in code reviews to guarantee high software quality standards and consistency across the codebase. You’ll participate actively in our SCRUM ceremonies to plan sprints, estimate tasks, and continuously improve our methodology. You will report to the Engineering Manager.About You Professional experience with Vuejs (Frontend framework). Good knowledge of vanilla JavaScript, TypeScript. Previous experience with Webpack, or other tools needed to build/bundle JavaScript applications. Experience with REST API implementation and Open API. Product engineer mindset: good understanding of the entire product development process (design, development, and deployment). Passion for software development and the ability to communicate and collaborate at all levels of the organization. Agile methodologies knowledge. Deep focus on automated tests (unit, functional, integration). Familiarity with CI/CD development process. Familiarity working with AWS cloud solutions (S3, Cloudfront). Previous experience with Observability tools (Datadog, NewRelic, etc) is considered a plus. Bachelor’s or master’s degree in Computer Science/Engineering preferred.Level of Experience:For this position we’re hiring a Senior Software Engineer: Consistently writes production-ready code that is easily testable. Constantly strives to make it readable by refactoring appropriately. Is aware of the organization's monitoring philosophy and uses systematic debugging to diagnose cross service issues. Consistently designs code that is aligned with the overall service architecture. Ensures their commitments are realistic, understands their priority and urgency, and delivers upon them accordingly. Delivers feedback to their team's business stakeholders when opportunities arise. Helps their teammates overcome obstacles, resolve blockers, and complete work tasks. Actively contributes to improving processes within the team.Growth path:At TUI Musement we have set standards for placing people in specific roles and levels of experience. We are very keen to ensure that everyone recognizes themselves in the role with the level of experience they deserve. For this purpose, we have adopted a matrix of skills that we use to accompany people to progress in their career path by setting specific personal goals for each one.About Our Offer Being a valuable team member of TUI, the No.1 global and socially aware travel company. Competitive salary and benefits. TUI Musement operates in over 115 destinations, offering more career opportunities than any other travel company. Clear and transparent growth path within the TUI Musement Engineering Career ladder. Develop yourself by working as part of an international team and through our free global learning and development program including free language lessons and various Management Development Programs.TUI Musement is a leading Tours & Activities business. It combines a scalable digital platform with local service delivery, to offer excursions, activities, tickets and transfers in more than 50 countries worldwide. There are over 130,000 'things to do' in all major holiday and city destinations, which are distributed through B2B partners, via the Musement and TUI websites and direct to TUI customers. We also offer services to cruise lines through Intercruises Shoreside & Port Services in port worldwide. TUI Musement sold around 10 million excursions, tours and activities delivered by our international colleagues located around the world and is one of the major growth areas of TUI Group.In 2018, TUI's Tours & Activities division acquired Musement, a leading traveltech start-up. Following a two-year transition period, both became one fully integrated business - known as TUI Musement - combining the global reach, strong resources and high quality in-destination service delivery of TUI, with the digital capabilities, agile working methodology and start-up mindset of Musement.If you want to know more about why TUI Group is the world’s leading tourism group, and our continuing work in the diversity & inclusion space, simply visit careers.tuigroup.com #TUIjobs #TUIMusement

fields.title: Java Backend Developer (Girona)
fields.details: About the job                                  ¿Eres un desarrollador/a de software apasionado y con experiencia en el desarrollo backend?Buscamos profesionales, amantes de la tecnología, que quieran trabajar en Girona para los proyectos de transformación digital más punteros del mundo, dando servicio a todas las áreas e industrias e implantando las últimas soluciones del mercado. ¿Aceptas el reto?.Accenture Technology es el lugar para alguien que busca una carrera de TI desafiante y acceso a formación, experiencia y herramientas de desarrollo que sólo una gran empresa puede ofrecer. Nuestro alcance internacional te permite ser parte de una organización verdaderamente global de personas, así como trabajar con clientes dinámicos en países de todo el mundo.Aquí, en Accenture, ¡estamos cambiando el mundo! ¿Quieres formar parte de ella? Si desea resolver problemas interesantes y dar forma al futuro de la tecnología, nos encantaría que te unieras a nuestro equipo de Desarrollo en Java Backend.Requisitos:Experiencia relevante en desarrollo con Java (al menos 2 años)BBDD: SQL, Oracle, MySQL.Experiencia y conocimientos en varios frameworks como: Spring, Hibernate, Vaadin, Spring Boot...Se tendrá en cuenta: Experiencia en la arquitectura y el desarrollo de MICROSERVICIOS, utilizando Spring Boot y otras tecnologías de Java modernas.Desarrollo de API.Experiencia con No-SQL (SQL, Oracle, MongoDB, ElasticSearch, Redis…).Buen nivel de inglés (no obligatorio)¿Qué ofrecemos?Contrato indefinido con un salario competitivoBeneficios como seguro de vida, seguro médico y retribución flexible.Flexibilidad horaria con jornada intensiva en verano durante dos meses y medio.Diferentes horarios para la conciliación familiar.Formación continua y posibilidad de certificacionesPodrás formar parte de nuestro LGTBY Ally employees’ group.Accenture is an equal opportunities employer and welcomes applications from all sections of society and does not discriminate on grounds of race, religion or belief, ethnic or national origin, disability, age, citizenship, marital, domestic or civil partnership status, sexual orientation, or gender identity, or any other basis as protected by applicable law.Igualdad de Oportunidades en el EmpleoTodas las decisiones de empleo se tomarán sin importar la edad, raza, credo, color, religión, sexo, origen nacional, ascendencia, grado de discapacidad, estado de veterano, orientación sexual, identidad o expresión de género, información genética, estado civil, estado de ciudadanía o cualquier otro motivo o circunstancias protegidas por las leyes federales, estatales o locales.

fields.title: Desarrollador Java
fields.details: About the job                                  Desde Grupo ICA seleccionamos un Desarrollador Java  para trabajar de forma remota en uno de los proyectos que estamos gestionando actualmente.Requisitos:2 años de experiencia en programación de software (java), despliegues, etc.Imprescindible conocimientos en testingExperiencia trabajando con la herramienta ALM¿ Qué ofrecemos?-Estabilidad laboral.-Proyección profesional.-Horario flexible.-Teletrabajo¿Quiénes somos?ICA, Informática y Comunicaciones Avanzadas S.L., somos una empresa TIC con más de 30 años de experiencia y con sedes en Barcelona, Madrid y Sevilla.Con un equipo de más de 650 profesionales, centramos nuestra oferta en medianas y grandes compañías y administración pública a través de soluciones de software en movilidad, portales, infraestructuras de comunicaciones, ciberseguridad, asistencia técnica, Business Intelligence, Big Data y e-learning.Si te interesan los entornos de innovación, la formación en últimas herramientas tecnológicas, el crecimiento basado en la mejora continua y los valores éticos aplicados a tu día a día, aquí puedes encontrar tu oportunidad.Además, en Grupo I.C.A contamos con la certificación EFR (Empresa Familiarmente Responsable) debido al compromiso que mostramos con la gestión de la conciliación de la vida familiar/ laboral y con la Igualdad de Oportunidades (gestión de la diversidad).

fields.title: Ingeniero de software
fields.details: About the job                                  The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing high-quality applications. They will also be responsible for designing and implementing testable and scalable code.  ResponsibilitiesDevelop quality software and web applicationsAnalyze and maintain existing software applicationsDesign highly scalable, testable codeDiscover and fix programming bugsQualificationsBachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science or related fieldDevelopment experience with programming languagesSQL database or relational database skillsIngeniero de softwareExperiencia mínima de 3 años como .NET Developer y SQL Server, desarrollando e implementando Web Services/API REST con conocimientos sobre arquitectura orientada a (Micro)servicios. Amplios conocimientos en programación orientada a objetos, patrones de diseño (MVC) y principios SOLID para garantizar la calidad del código desarrollado. Competencias:Desarrollo de software con C# / ASP .NET Core / Angular, y tecnologías de bases de datos (SQL / MS-SQL)Experiencia en integración continua.Orientado al uso de unit test frameworks (JUnit, testNG, Mocking, etc).Persona comprometida, positiva, resolutiva, empática y con capacidad para trabajar en equipo. Experiencia deseable:Conocimiento en el desarrollo de plataformas web B2C.Experiencia en proyectos desarrollados bajo metodologías ágiles y en proyectos de integración, con complejidad técnica.Se valorará conocimientos y experiencia en IoT, Azure y Azure Devops.

fields.title: Senior DevOps Engineer
fields.details: About the job                                  The RoleWe are looking for a Senior DevOps Engineer who will have a holistic approach about systems when driving the definition, building, deployment and operations of applications in close collaboration with their Engineering, QA and Operations peers.We are seeking an individual who will show ownership and can help build the appropriate bridges and processes across the various teams, leveraging experience with minimal direction, while balancing trade-off and strict processes and methodologies in a fast-paced environment. This individual will lead the creation and evolution of our CI/CD pipelines for deployment and operations of solutions across various environments which may include on-prem or cloud systems.Our products intersect with all the current and exciting trends in the automotive and transportation industries and our business is growing every year. Our people and our platforms are the foundation and enabler of that growth.We are expanding our team looking for technologists with a passion for developing highly available and distributed applications on-prem and in the cloud, and a drive to deliver software products that make a meaningful difference in the lives of others.We expect the ideal candidate to be proficient in the following technologies and tools (list not exhaustive), in particular the CI/CD and Infrastructure stacks:CI/CD: Octopus Deploy, Jenkins, NuGet, SonarQube, SpinnakerSource Control and Processes: Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket/Git/GitHubLanguages: Python, PowerShell, batch, bashInfrastructure: Windows/Linux, AWS, Kubernetes/EKS, Terraform, DockerBackend: MS SQL Server, Cassandra, Kafka, Redis, Elasticsearch, Prometheus, GrafanaTraditional internet and security protocols (HTTP, TLS, PKI)What Will You DoOwnership in a very agile and fast paced environment of the CI/CD pipeline for deployment and operations of systems including Infrastructure as CodeCreate and maintain the continuously evolving DevOps CI/CD pipelines across environmentsDevelop with cross-functional teams’ strategies towards higher organizational throughput via automation and flexible processesDesign and create reliable continuous deployment solutions that will yield higher availability and uptime for our internal and external customersHelp the team balance and plan longer term projects against the demands of a fast-changing environmentDiagnose, troubleshoot and resolve issues related to environmentsSupport Engineering and QA teams along the steps of the Software Development Life Cycle by maintaining environments and toolsMaintain and develop documentation to facilitate understanding of products, features, and tools, including training materialWhat Will You BringMinimum QualificationsB.S. or M.S. Degree in Computer Science/Computer Information Science or equivalent experience (M.S. highly desirable)5+ years of experience driving CI/CD for systems being deployed to cloud providers (proficiency with AWS services and associated setup/operations highly desirable)5+ years of experience in a 24x7x365 global SaaS/PaaS operation3+ years of experience with virtualization and Docker containersProficiency with scripting languages (PowerShell, batch, bash, Python, or equivalent) Preferred QualificationsExperience with Octopus Deploy is desiredYou demonstrate proficiency the technologies in our stack (see above) with 2+ years of experience in a large portion of the tools and technologies we leverage, in particular the CI/CD and Infra stacks.You demonstrate a high sense of urgency and ownershipYou take great pride in helping teams and individualsYou have competence in building and designing complex systems leveraging multiple technologies (legacy and new)You can demonstrate and ensure consistency in line with industry best practices for CI/CD, code quality, operational readiness, and securityStrong organizational skills in a fast paced and fast changing environmentYou are driven, self-motivated to learn and ramp up fastYou are candid and are able to hold your own as the DevOps representative in cross-functional teamsAdvanced Cloud experience, preferably AWS, is strong plus.Agile program experience a plus (Scrum, Sprints, Retros, etc...).Experience with Jira & Confluence a plus.

fields.title: Java Developer - Flight Products
fields.details: About the job                                  Are you a Java enthusiast? Are you looking for a challenging change? Join one of our tech hubs in Barcelona, Porto or Madrid (other locations in Spain and Portugal are equally possible) and help us to shape the future of travel and provide the best travel experience to over 17 million of customers.🚀 At eDreams ODIGEO we aim to help customers reach their destination by finding the best travel deals, combining more than 600 airlines and 100.000 flights worldwide every day to offer millions of combinations in real time of different products, like flights, trains and hotels.✈️ You will build and evolve our Flights Search/Booking/PostBooking Domain microservices platform, which powers more than 2.5 billions searches every month, providing the best airline offers to our customers in more than 40 different countries 🌎. Do you want to learn how to generate more than 9Bn itineraries in less than 5s? And even more…help us reach our vision and take this to instant search results?We are a travel company, but more importantly, a tech company, aspiring to be the best in cutting edge technologies and ways of working, always looking to evolve to the next step.We are offering you the chance to learn and work with innovative technologies including Java11, BigData (Kafka, Cassandra, BigTable, Redis, Neo4j), machine learning and Datamesh in a continuous delivery and cloud based environment (Docker, Kubernetes and GCP). Everything is supported by a high quality monitoring process with Sonarqube and Datadog.We don’t look just for developers to do their code and move on to the next ticket, we want Engineers that challenge the status quo, bring new ideas to the table, influence, drive and have a say in the way we address our customers, the way we build our product and the way we work. Does this sound like you? 👇What you’ll need to be successful: Able to code with Java or any Object oriented programming. We care about skills, not frameworks experience.  Understand and apply best practices for your given technical area. Interested in learning our domain and technologies and evolving your data-driven capabilities and design pattern skills.  Quality mindset -> you deliver consistently correct and well tested code.  Contribute to positive and inclusive team culture. You understand the power of feedback and you know how to deliver praise and constructive feedback within your team.  Team player -> You enjoy collaborating, sharing your skills and knowledge with others.  Constantly looking to expand your skills and skill-sets through learning and increasing knowledge.  Good English level that will allow you to work in a multicultural environment. Our teams are from all over the world (> 45 nationalities), with different backgrounds, cultures and interests. What’s in it for you? 🚀Grow your career with our Fast-track development program. You will be able to tailor and accelerate your growth, choosing between 6 steps development career path, 3 steps architecture career path or 3 steps management career path.  Work wherever and whenever: You will have a great lifestyle and work-life-balance 🏡 with our: flexible hours policy, short Friday schedule (9am-3pm) and flexible remote working policy. You will have the option to work from any location in Spain and Portugal, with occasional travels to one of our main hub locations (Barcelona, Madrid and Porto).  Choose your equipment and really own it! You can choose the OS, laptop and monitor you want to work with and the equipment is totally yours after 3 years in the company.  Competitive compensation package with an attractive bonus structure PLUS.  A free eDreams Prime subscription to benefit from significant discounts on your travels and hotel bookings.  Special discounts in other local venues, such as gyms, restaurants, shops.  Flexible remuneration plan that allows you to pay reduced rates and tax free for childcare, transport, restaurants, and health insurance.  Continuous growth and learning.  Our Learning & Development programs give you access to tech talks, soft and technical skills training, external events, industry conferences etc.  Language classes for English and also Spanish classes for eDOers relocated to Spain.  A great relocation package, for those that decide to move to one of our hub locations (Barcelona, Madrid or Porto).  Amazing offices in central locations in Barcelona, Madrid and Porto, newly refurbished to support team building and social activities. Come fly with us and apply now!At eDreams ODIGEO we are committed to being an equal opportunity employer, promoting diversity and inclusion at the workplacein all the countries we are present. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, skin color, nationality, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability status or any other feature that can be perceived as discriminatory.We are more than 1000 people from more than 45 nationalities. All different and diverse, but all united by shared values and focused on achieving success, together as a team. Our people are the key of our success. Each one of them is unique in their own way and the respect for their uniqueness is and will always be a passion and motivation.

fields.title: Software Developer
fields.details: About the job                                  Nuestro cliente es una consolidada empresa del sector de la movilidad, que cuenta con una amplia gama de productos y se encuentra en fase de crecimiento. Para oficinas en Rubí, están seleccionando un/a: Software Developer Integrado en el departamento de IT y reportando al responsable del área, se encargará de la gestión y supervisión de la estructura informática de la compañía, del desarrollo de herramientas informáticas y mejoras internas y del soporte informático para todas las áreas de la empresa. Entre sus tareas y responsabilidades destacamos: Gestión de incidencias de usuarios de la compañía.Mantenimiento de Software (actualizaciones, seguridad, usuarios) y soporte en Hardware (revisiones, periféricos, nuevos equipos).Desarrollo de herramientas de automatización con MS Power Automate.Implementación de plataformas informáticas.Gestión de proveedores informáticos.Desarrollo web en PHP / Java Script. Pensamos en una persona con formación acorde a la posición (grado medio/superior en informática o similar) con experiencia en un puesto y responsabilidad similar. Debe tratarse de una persona resolutiva, organizada y con actitud de mejora. El puesto implica tener buenos conocimientos informáticos (Office, CRM, ERP…) e inglés medio. Se valorará el conocimiento y experiencia en PHP, Java Script y otros lenguajes de programación (SQL, Phyton, Pearl). Ofrecemos la oportunidad de formar parte de una empresa sólida y consolidada con un proyecto de crecimiento.

fields.title: Java Developer (F/M)
fields.details: About the job                                  Desde Volkswagen Group Services estamos buscando a programadores/as Java para proyectos de Desarrollo de software para sistemas de Infotainment en vehículos del grupo VW.De esta manera, las tareas a realizar son, entre otras:- Análisis técnico de los requerimientos así como del flujo y definición funcional.- Realización de pruebas de concepto para comprobar la viabilidad técnica o la usabilidad/aceptación de ciertas funcionalidades.- Creación de la arquitectura del proyecto, escogiendo un patrón de diseño adecuado.- Aplicar best practices de programación en cada una de las tareas técnicas realizadas.- Estimación de tareas técnicas (features, changes, bugs, etc.) en horas.- Revisión de documentación técnica y/o Funcional.- Revisión continuada de las diferentes APIs e interfaces de comunicación.- Análisis de la implementación en Guide Model así como en AppAdapter. - Creación de tests unitarios y UI test.- Monitorizado y revisión de la correcta ejecución de los jobs de integración continua.- Tareas de revisión de código.- Asistencia a las reuniones de sprint plannings, reviews y retrospectives, así como a los daily meetings.Requisitos mínimos:· Conocimientos en Java.· Nivel medio-alto de Inglés.Valorable :· Experiencia en proyectos dentro del ámbito electrónico, desarrollo y/o infotainment.· Experiencia con herramientas de seguimiento de desarrollo de software ágiles: JIRA, Confluence, Jenkins, GIT.¿Qué ofrecemos?- 60% de Teletrabajo.- Subvención diaria para la cantina.- Formación subvencionada en idiomas.- Acceso gratuito a transporte de empresa.- Plan de carrera profesional.- Ser parte del Grupo Volkswagen.- Descuentos en automóviles del grupo.

fields.title: System Integrator
fields.details: About the job                                  Location : BarcelonaCity : BarcelonaState : Barcelona (ES-B)Country : Spain (ES)Requisition Number : 25556Bunge has an exciting opportunity available for a System Integration Architect. In this role you will be part of a global team working on challenging, meaningful projects impacting core business activities.Since 1818, Bunge has been connecting farmers to consumers to deliver essential food, feed, and fuel to the world. Looking to the future, our ambition is to continuously reinvent ourselves, leveraging data to be at the forefront of analytics, technology and talent to accomplish our purpose in a better, faster and simpler way. Bunge is committed to operating and thriving in the digital world – creating world class agile teams where teammates are empowered and encouraged to collaborate and test and learn to succeed.At Bunge, people don’t just come here to work, they come here to grow – solving challenges that directly impact the world with a diverse team of thinkers and doers. Most importantly, in all we do we live our values: Act as One Team by fostering inclusion, collaboration, and respect  Drive for Excellence by being agile, innovative and efficient  Do What's Right by acting safely, ethically, and sustainably Overview:This role will be responsible for designing, architecting, implementing, and optimizing enterprise integration by enabling interoperability and communication between multiple IT components. The ideal candidate will lead the delivery of solution development for large complex projects and design integration architecture specifications that meet requirements from a business and technical perspective while ensuring adherence to global technology standards and best practices.Responsibilites:  Design cutting-edge enterprise integration solutions, engineer scalable reusable components, models, and exception handling frameworks  Plan, coordinate, and implement large-scale, complex integration solutions to support the expanding needs of different stakeholders in the organization  Devise, modularize, and modernize integration solutions by adopting pub/sub design pattern models and API-lead connectivity solutions  Work closely with Bunge Shared Service Centers (SSCs) to ensure all change management and global process standards are followed  Maintain thorough technical documentation and ensure artifacts are always up-to-date  Interact with Projects Managers, Business Analysts, Architects, Developers and stakeholders throughout the Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC)  Supervise the development of high quality, well documented, and efficient code  Challenge ideas and opinions to avoid pitfalls and inefficient solutions  Build using modern design patterns and architectural principles  Support product owner in defining future stories and tech lead in defining technical designs Qualifications/Requirements: Around 5-7 years of working experience in developing and designing large-scale integration solutions and related technologies  Expertise in Enterprise Application Integration (EAI) and Business Process Management (BPM) products (TIBCO, MuleSoft, MQ, Kafka/Nifi, etc)  Expertise in coding best practices, integration design patterns, exception handling frameworks, and proven integration architectures (pub/sub)  Experience in designing professional technical solutions and closely guiding development teams during implementation  Knowledge of mainstream cloud solutions and services (AWS, GCP, Azure)  Exceptional ability to white-board design ideas and present to larger groups to align with technical strategy  Good understanding of cyber security principles and practices relating to the integration layer of enterprise systems (API Gateways, etc)  Ability to work with relational and non-relational databases (Oracle, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL)  Provide subject matter expertise on enterprise integration systems and products, assist in evaluating tools and technologies to fit the organization’s technology strategy and roadmap  Identify business value when developing ideas with a focus on digital awareness, risk assessment, business continuity, and scalable designs  Preferred: Experience working with Java platform (JEE), SAP (BAPI, Webservices, IDOC), CRM solutions (Salesforce), and ORM solutions (Hibernate, JPA, iBExperience in Agile development methodologies  Understand technical best practices to support Agile development  Understanding basics of Scrum methodology, roles, and responsibilities  atis)  A keen learner within the technical components of the domains/products  Excellent knowledge of latest development technologies  Experience with code refactoring, design patterns, design-driven development, CI/CD, and highly scalable applications  High energy and passionate individual who inspires teammates to reach their maximum potential  Engaged, focused and goal-oriented  Open to participating in continuous improvement processes in agile environment  Excited to try new solutions  Embraces a culture of trust and complete transparency  Promotes free thought – is energized by ideas from others in team Note: you don’t need to be located in Barcelona to obtain this job. It can be done remotely with a combination of traveling and occasional presence at Bunge sites (approximately 5-10 travels per business year). However, you do need to speak both Spanish and English language fluently.If this description reflects your profile or ambition, we’re looking forward to see your application and motivation in English by hitting apply!Acquisition by agencies is not appreciated, we do not use agencies at this moment for our recruitment. Open proposals of candidates are at own risk.Bunge (NYSE: BG) is a world leader in sourcing, processing and supplying oilseed and grain products and ingredients. Founded in 1818, Bunge’s expansive network feeds and fuels a growing world, creating sustainable products and opportunities for more than 70,000 farmers and the consumers they serve across the globe. The company is headquartered in St. Louis, Missouri and has 25,000 employees worldwide who stand behind more than 350 port terminals, oilseed processing plants, grain facilities, and food and ingredient production and packaging facilities around the world.Bunge is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, transgender status, national origin, citizenship, age, disability or military or veteran status, or any other legally protected status. Bunge is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Minorities/Women/Veterans/Disabled

fields.title: Programador full stack
fields.details: About the job                                  En Sotec Consulting buscamos un FullStack para importante proyecto de innovación en modalidad Teletrabajo.Funciones:Analisis y Desarrollo en Java, Spring Boot.Analisis y Desarrollo en Angular, FormioEntorno Devops: Jenkins, Nexus y derivados.Bases de datos MongoDb, NoSQL.Metodologías Agiles.Horario Flexible + Proyecto EstableModalidad TELETRABAJORetribución negociable
